        返回:

      • savePreference

        public static void savePreference(ECPreferenceSettings pref,
                  java.lang.Object value,
                  boolean applied)
                           throws java.io.InvalidClassException
        Method that saves a preference.
        参数:
        pref - The preference identifier
        value - The value of the preference
        applied - If the preference was applied
        抛出:
        java.io.InvalidClassException - If the value of the preference is not of the type of the preference

      • savePreferences

        public static void savePreferences(java.util.Map<ECPreferenceSettings,java.lang.Object> prefs,
                   boolean applied)
                            throws java.io.InvalidClassException
        Method that saves the preferences passed as argument.
        参数:
        prefs - The preferences to be saved
        applied - If the preference was applied
        抛出:
        java.io.InvalidClassException - If the value of a preference is not of the type of the preference
